original_title: Depeche Mode: Touring the Angel — Live in Milan
overview: Depeche Mode's 'Touring The Angel' was one of the most successful, highly grossing and critically acclaimed tours of 2006. Hailed as the greatest live performances of their career, it was recorded at Milan's Fila Forum on February 18th and 19th 2006 and sees the band at their live best with a pulsing sound, electric stage presence and ecstatic audience.
title: Depeche Mode: Touring the Angel — Live in Milan
